abstract: The maker of quirky home furnishings will continue to make some products locally and has found a way to produce in China, too.
snippet: The maker of quirky home furnishings will continue to make some products locally and has found a way to produce in China, too.
lead_paragraph: Last week, we published a case study about Jellio, a company that makes whimsical home furnishings that are hard to manufacture. Demand for Jellio’s products, which include its top-selling Gummi Bear candy-inspired GummiLights, was strong. But to build the business, the owner, Mario Marsicano, knew he had to increase production while reducing costs.

headline.main: How Jellio Is Solving Its Manufacturing Problems
